feature_model.name: Web_Content_Delivery
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Web_Content_Delivery (Web_Content_Delivery) :m Check_for_content_updates (Check_for_content_updates) :o Encrypt_content (Encrypt_content) :g [1, *] : Serve_from_cache (Serve_from_cache) :o Store_in_cache (Store_in_cache) :g [1, 1] : Store_in_proxy_cache (Store_in_proxy_cache) : Store_in_browser_cache (Store_in_browser_cache) :g [1, 1] : Short_term_cache (Short_term_cache) : Long_term_cache (Long_term_cache) :g [1, 1] : Serve_from_proxy_cache (Serve_from_proxy_cache) : Serve_from_browser_cache (Serve_from_browser_cache) : Authorise_access_to_content (Authorise_access_to_content) :g [1, 1] : Check_after_defined_wait (Check_after_defined_wait) : Check_after_heuristic_wait (Check_after_heuristic_wait) : Always_check_for_updates (Always_check_for_updates)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~Check_after_heuristic_wait or Store_in_cache constraint_2:~Check_after_defined_wait or Store_in_cache constraint_3:~Store_in_proxy_cache or Serve_from_proxy_cache constraint_4:~Store_in_browser_cache or Serve_from_browser_cache constraint_5:~Always_check_for_updates or Authorise_access_to_content constraint_6:~Serve_from_proxy_cache or ~Short_term_cache constraint_7:~Serve_from_proxy_cache or ~Long_term_cache
